codeList:
$ kubectl get sc

NAME                  PROVISIONER                  RECLAIMPOLICY    VOLUMEBIINDINGMODE    ALLOWVOLUMEEXPANSION     AGE
standard (default)    k8s.io/minikube-hostpath     Delete           Immediate             false 
$ helm repo add milvus https://zilliztech.github.io/milvus-helm/
helm repo add zilliztech https://zilliztech.github.io/milvus-helm
helm repo update
# upgrade existing helm release
helm upgrade my-release zilliztech/milvus
$ helm repo update
cat <<EOF > custom-values.yaml
dataNode:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
queryNode:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
EOF
$ helm install my-release milvus/milvus -f custom-values.yaml
cat <<EOF > custom-values.yaml
standalone:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
EOF
$ helm install my-release milvus/milvus --set cluster.enabled=false --set etcd.replicaCount=1 --set minio.mode=standalone --set pulsarv3.enabled=false -f custom-values.yaml
cat <<EOF > custom-values.yaml
dataNode:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "2"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "2"
queryNode:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "2"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "2"
EOF
cat <<EOF > custom-values.yaml
dataNode:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
  extraEnv:
    - name: CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
      value: "0"
queryNode:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
  extraEnv:
    - name: CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
      value: "1"
EOF
$ helm install my-release milvus/milvus -f custom-values.yaml
cat <<EOF > custom-values.yaml
dataNode:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "2"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "2"
queryNode:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "2"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "2"
EOF
cat <<EOF > custom-values.yaml
dataNode:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
  extraEnv:
    - name: CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
      value: "0"
queryNode:
  resources:
    requests:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
    limits:
      nvidia.com/gpu: "1"
  extraEnv:
    - name: CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
      value: "1"
EOF
$ helm install my-release milvus/milvus --set cluster.enabled=false --set etcd.replicaCount=1 --set minio.mode=standalone --set pulsarv3.enabled=false -f custom-values.yaml
$ kubectl get pods
NAME                                             READY  STATUS   RESTARTS  AGE
my-release-etcd-0                                  1/1     Running     0             3m24s
my-release-etcd-1                                  1/1     Running     0             3m24s
my-release-etcd-2                                  1/1     Running     0             3m24s

my-release-milvus-streamingnode-5867bfbcbf-cg9xx   1/1     Running     0             3m24s

$ kubectl get pod my-release-milvus-proxy-6bd7f5587-ds2xv --template
='{{(index (index .spec.containers 0).ports 0).containerPort}}{{"\n"}}'
19530
$ kubectl port-forward service/my-release-milvus 27017:19530
Forwarding from 127.0.0.1:27017 -> 19530
$ kubectl port-forward --address 0.0.0.0 service/my-release-milvus 27017:19530
Forwarding from 0.0.0.0:27017 -> 19530
$ kubectl port-forward --address 0.0.0.0 service/my-release-milvus 27018:9091
Forwarding from 0.0.0.0:27018 -> 9091
$ helm uninstall my-release
headingContent: Run Milvus with GPU Support Using Helm Chart

anchorList.label: 헬름 차트를 사용하여 GPU 지원으로 밀버스 실행하기
